group_1.narration: When I noticed it,@"I" was already standing in front of me.
How did I know that person was me?
...Why, that's because she explained it to me.
To be honest, I don't really understand it...@But! If you stop to think everything through, @then the story won't get anywhere,@so I decided to just go with it.
Then, the me in front of me @said to me "What's happeing here is happening, @and yet, it isn't really happening."
Once again, I don't really understand it...@But! If you stop to think everything through @then the story won't get anywhere, @so I decided to just go with it.
However, the next words that the me in front of me @said to me were something that I couldn't ignore!

group_1.textLeft: You're saying that I'm not@suited for the Ryushin-ryu school?!

group_1.textRight: That's right...@though perhaps I should say "we" aren't suited...
The reason I'm here is to tell you that.

group_1.textLeft: Suddenly showing up and saying that...@that's beyond rude! Rude times 10 million!
Who the hell do you think you are?!
...Oh, that's right...we were just talking about that...

group_1.textRight: Explaining it a little more,@I'm a part of you that's usually hidden...
To be exact, I'm a part from deep within your heart.
Well, at this point it doesn't really matter what I am.
The important thing is that Asuka Tatsuki@is not the right person for Ryushin-ryu...
The reason I'm here is to convince you of that fact.

group_1.textLeft: That's it! That's the thing! @Why on earth would you say that...?!

group_1.textRight: Do you...want to master the Ryushin-ryu?

group_1.textLeft: Of course! I am devoted to that purpose!

group_1.narration: The blade of your naginata has been sullied.

group_1.textLeft: For I, Asuka Tatsuki, to have sullied my blade...!
What are you saying I did?!

group_1.narration: You signed a contract to become a magical girl...
